explains: n. （有组织的）聚会，团聚；重逢，团圆；再联合，重新统一
wordGroup: family reunion dinner 团圆饭；年夜饭

sentences.en: Christmas is a time of reunion.
The association holds an annual reunion.
sentences.cn: 这个协会每年举行一次重聚会。

sentences.en: If you don't come to the reunion you'll be sorely missed.
sentences.cn: 你要是不来参加团聚，大家会非常想念你的。
